page.title: 07JIMMY HADDOCK
page.content: This story about Jimmy Haddock, who is buried in St. Patrick's churchyard, is important because it was written down at the time. Jimmy Haddock died and his property was suposed to go to his son but his wife gave the property to someone else.For 4 years Jimmy Haddock's ghost appeared to a parishioner called Tavener and told him to take the case to court. Tavener said he had no witnesses. Tavener was plagued by the ghost everywhere he went untill he was forced to take the case to Carrickfergus court. In the court Tavener said to call Jimmy Haddock. Everyone in the court laughed and thought how can he come when he is dead. A great wind shook the court,a hand appeared on the Bible and a voice said "Is this enough?"The judge said that it was.Jimmy's son won the case.
